Course Description:
THIS COURSE IS AN INTRODUCTION TO COMPUTERIZED INTEGRATED ACCOUNTING
PROCEDURES FOUND IN MICROCOMPUTER OFFICE ENVIRONMENTS. THE POPULAR
QUICKBOOKS ACCOUNTING PROGRAM IS USED TO RECORD FINANCIAL
TRANSACTIONS. MAJOR TOPICS INCLUDE MANAGING REVENUE AND EXPENSES,
PAYROLL SETUP AND PROCESSING, BANK RECONCILIATION, REPORTS, AND
GRAPHS, INVENTORY, AND ADJUSTMENTS AND YEAR-END PROCEDURES, AND
COMPANY FILE SETUP AND MAINTENANCE.
Textbook(s): COMPUTER ACCOUNTING WITH QUICKBOOKS 2015; AUTHOR: KAY; ISBN: 9781259937132; PUBLISHER: MCGRAW HILL, 17TH ED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
